title: React
content: A javascript library for building user interfaces

title: Next.js
content: A React framework for building server-rendered React applications. It enables developers to create dynamic and interactive web applications with ease.

title: Tailwind CSS
content: TailwindCSS is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces. It provides a set of low-level utility classes that you can compose to build any design, directly in your markup.

title: ExpressJS
content: A minimalistic web framework for Node.js that provides a robust set of features to develop web and mobile applications.

title: Relational Database Management System
content: MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQLite are popular relational database management systems. They use SQL for data manipulation and querying. Each system has its own strengths and is suitable for different types of applications.

title: Full Stack Dev
content: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, NodeJS, ExpressJS, SQL, Sequelize and API Development

title: Databases and ORMS
content: Databases: SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL-Lite, etc. ORMs: Sequelize, Prisma, Drizzle, etc
